changeSet.sql: TRUNCATE TABLE products RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;

INSERT INTO products (type_id, status, barcode, image_url, title, category, condition_label, dominant_color, return_policy, height, width, length, weight, original_value, current_price, stock, attributes) VALUES -- Lượt 1 (Ảnh 1-9) -- 1. Music Concert (Ảnh Lana Del Rey) ((SELECT id FROM product_types WHERE code = 'DVD'), 'ACTIVE', 'DVD-CON-001', 'https://res.cloudinary.com/ddlhbvrrc/image/upload/v1766598973/lana-del-rey-paradise.jpg-copy-800x800_r8ypjg.webp', 'Lana Del Rey: Live at Hollywood Bowl', 'Music Concert', 'NEW', 'Gold', 'No return', 19.0, 13.5, 1.4, 0.15, 550000, 480000, 40, '{"artist": "Lana Del Rey", "duration_mins": 120, "format": "DVD+HD", "region": "All"}'::jsonb),
-- 2. Classic Movie (Ảnh Vinyl) ((SELECT id FROM product_types WHERE code = 'DVD'), 'ACTIVE', 'DVD-MOV-001', 'https://res.cloudinary.com/ddlhbvrrc/image/upload/v1766598975/vinyl-1662290657854_custvi.jpg', 'Pulp Fiction (Collector''s Edition)', 'Movie', 'NEW', 'Black', '30-day return', 19.0, 13.5, 1.4, 0.18, 450000, 399000, 60, '{"director": "Quentin Tarantino", "year": 1994, "rating": "R", "duration_mins": 154}'::jsonb),
